sql-select.name: GetTablesWithMissingForeignKeyIndexes
Missing Foreign Key Indexes
sql-select.description: Find all foreign keys that do not have a corresponding index.
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSS.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[type_desc] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[create_date] AS [ObjectCreateDate] ,tSC.[name] AS [ColumnName] ,tSFK.[name] AS [ForeignKeyName] FROM [sys].[objects] tSO INNER JOIN [sys].[schemas] tSS ON tSS.[schema_id] = tSO.[schema_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[columns] tSC ON tSC.[object_id] = tSO.[object_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[foreign_keys] tSFK ON tSFK.[parent_object_id] = tSO.[object_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[foreign_key_columns] tSFKC ON tSFKC.[constraint_object_id] = tSFK.[object_id] AND tSFKC.[parent_column_id] = tSC.[column_id] LEFT OUTER JOIN [sys].[index_columns] tSIC ON tSIC.[object_id] = tSO.[object_id] AND tSIC.[column_id] = tSC.[column_id] WHERE tSO.[type_desc] = N'USER_TABLE' AND OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[object_id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 AND tSIC.[object_id] IS NULL GROUP BY tSS.[name] ,tSO.[name] ,tSO.[type_desc] ,tSO.[create_date] ,tSC.[name] ,tSFK.[name] ORDER BY tSS.[name] ,tSO.[name] ,tSC.[name] ;
